text: Mee guu wanga labelaa ana helekai aanei gi digau Levi ala go nia gau agoago o Israel, ala ne hagadabu ang gi Dimaadua: “Dugu ina Tebedebe di Hagababa dabu gi lodo di Hale Daumaha dela ne hau go King Solomon, tama daane a David. Goodou hudee dagidagia di maa, malaa goodou la belee hai hegau gi Dimaadua di godou God mo ana daangada Israel.
